subject: Officiating (Sports)
College Athletics
Basketball
Amateur Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Absent in the regular season, standby officials are used in conference tournaments and the N.C.A.A. tournament, just in case something unexpected happens. And the unexpected keeps happening.
